程序包 org.am21.model.chat

类 ServerChatManager

java.lang.Object
org.am21.model.chat.ServerChatManager
public class ServerChatManager extends Object
This class is used to manage the chat messages Every match has a chat manager

    • handlePrivateChatMessage

      public static boolean handlePrivateChatMessage(Player sender, String receiver, String message)
      Manage the private message
      参数:
      sender - sender's Player instance
      receiver - receiver name
      message - message
      返回:
      false if the operation fails, otherwise true

    • isOnline

      public static Player isOnline(String receiverName)
      Find the player receiver by name
      参数:
      receiverName - receiver name (String)
      返回:
      receiver's Player instance if exist and is online, otherwise null

    • getChatKey

      public static String getChatKey(String name1, String name2)
      Find the Key to use in ChatMap by two player name
      参数:
      name1 - player 1 name
      name2 - player 2 name
      返回:
      (String) key

    • createNewPrivateChat

      public static boolean createNewPrivateChat(Player p1, Player p2)
      Create a new private for 2 players
      参数:
      p1 - player 1
      p2 - player 2
      返回:
      false if the nicknames are the same or if the chat already exists, otherwise true
